Portfolio

A cloud-based contact center dashboard offers a softphone panel for agents to receive and initiate calls, It displays the call statistics and history inside grid boxes which are able to be resized, deleted, and moved throughout the page. Built with React, React-grid-layout, Redux, React-router, and Reactstrap.

Live Demo

A COVID-19 tracker that displays all active cases, recovered, and deaths in the world and for each specific country as well. I used React hooks, disease.sh API, leaflet for interactive map, chart.js and Material-UI for styling.
